shop_details_section.title: If you have any pick-up enquires, please contact merchant via the following channels:

order_voucher_details.transferrableLinkDescription: Anyone with access to the link can collect the e-Coupon you sent.
order_voucher_details.cancelContent: Once canceled, the transferable link will be invalid. New e-Coupon will be allocated to your wallet again.

code_share.limit_share_remark: You only have the last chance to initiate a transfer; if the e-Coupon is not redeemed within valid period, it cannot be transferred again.

share_rule.text: After clicking "Confirm Transfer", please share the link with your friends, and notify your friends to conduct redemption within
{{share_expiry_days}} days
and they will not be able to claim it after the link expired.
The first recipient who clicks the link to confirm redemption will receive the e-Coupon in chronological order.
Your e-Coupon will be temporarily invalid after the sharing is initiated. It will be re-issued to your e-wallet - "Available e-Coupon" if no one receives it within
{{share_expiry_days}} days
or you cancelled the sharing.
You will have
{{share_limit}} times
to cancel the transfer, and will not be able to share when the transfer limit is reached.

code_share.receive_success: You have successfully redeemed the e-Coupon!

shop_details_section.title: 如需查詢取貨事宜，請透過以下方式聯絡商戶：

order_voucher_details.transferrableLinkDescription: 任何人收到此連結都可收取你的電子禮券。
order_voucher_details.cancelContent: 贈送連結將會失效，你將會重新得到禮券碼。

code_share.limit_share_remark: 你只有最後1次發起轉贈的機會；如果發起後沒有在有效期限內被領取，禮券將不能再被轉發。

share_rule.text: 確定「發起轉贈」後，請把連結分享給好友，並通知好友在接收後
{{share_expiry_days}}天
內點撃連結，否則將無法領取
第一個點撃分享連結，並確定領取的朋友，將會獲得禮券
發起轉贈後，你的禮券將會失效；如
{{share_expiry_days}}天
內無人領取， 或你選擇「取消轉贈」，禮券將會重新發回至你的「可用電子禮券」
你有
{{share_limit}}次
「取消轉贈」的機會，到達上限後將不可再轉贈

shop_details_section.title: 如需查询取货事宜，请透过以下方式联络商户：

order_voucher_details.transferrableLinkDescription: 任何人收到此链接都可收取你的电子礼券。
order_voucher_details.cancelContent: 赠送链接将会失效, 你将会重新得到礼券码

code_share.receive_status: 你已获赠一张电子礼券！
code_share.limit_share_remark: 你只有最后一次发卡转赠的机会; 如果发起后没有在有效期限内被领取，礼券将不能再被转赠。

share_rule.text: 确定「发起转赠」后，请把链接分享给好友，並通知好友在接收后
{{share_expiry_days}}天
内点击链接，否则将无法领取
第一个点击分享链接，並确定领取的好友，将会获得礼券
发起转赠后，你的礼券将会失效；如
{{share_expiry_days}}天
内无人领取， 或你选择「取消转赠」，礼券将会重新发回至你的「可用电子礼券」
你有
{{share_limit}}次
「取消转赠」的机会，到达上限后将不可再被转赠

code_share.receive_success: 你已成功领取电子礼券！
